source:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_00Haermaga wishes to shower you with praise, while R'fhul Tia prepares to tackle the obstacle course.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガは、冒険者を待っているようだ

source:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_01Following your emphatic conquest of the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, you return to Haermaga to share the good news. In light of your inspirational display, R'fhul Tia eagerly prepares for his own attempt. R'majha races ahead to find a spot from which the two of you can watch her brother's acrobatics.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ヘールマガに常夏の魔城の達成を報告した。冒険者の活躍を観ていたル・フル・ティアは感激した様子で、自分も参加すると言って飛びだしてしまった。「」に向かい、ル・フル・ティアの様子を見守ろう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_02<tab>Immediately after setting foot on the starting platform, R'fhul Tia charges forward to make the very first jump. Unfortunately, he possesses all the airborne grace of a sodden sponge and plunges unceremoniously in the water below. Fearing for his safety, R'majha rushes over to check on her crestfallen sibling.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_02<tab>指定地点で待機した。常夏の魔城のスタート地点から駆けだしたル・フル・ティアは、勢い余って海に落下してしまった。「ル・フル・ティア」のもとに向かおう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_03<tab>After dragging himself to shore, R'fhul Tia regains his composure and tries to hide his embarrassment with laughter. His sister takes offense at this and storms off without explaining the reason for her anger. As you and R'fhul Tia continue the conversation without her, she disappears from view entirely. Realizing she is now missing, R'fhul Tia asks you to help search for her.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_03<tab>ル・フル・ティアと話した。ル・マージャは、常夏の魔城に失敗した兄ル・フル・ティアが笑う様子を見ると、急にどこかへ駆けだしてしまった。紅蓮祭会場で「ル・マージャ」を捜そう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_04<tab>You eventually find R'majha on the eastern shore, having covered a surprising distance in such a short time. Her excursion has done nothing to brighten her mood, and she stubbornly refuses to talk to her brother. R'fhul Tia suggests splashing her with water to help ease the tension.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_04<tab>ル・マージャを見つけた。ル・フル・ティアが話しかけても、相変わらず機嫌を損ねている様子だ。「ル・マージャ」にエモート「水をかける」をして、機嫌をなおしてあげよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_05<tab>The splashes of cold sea water do the trick, setting R'majha to giggling and washing away her black mood. She explains her frustration at seeing her brother's jovial reaction to his abysmal performance on the obstacle course. R'fhul Tia has long claimed it his dream to become an adventurer, and as such, his sister expected him to treat the contest more seriously. She also expresses concern about his plans to leave home in search of fame and fortune. R'fhul Tia assures her that although he may be parted from his family, he will not place himself in unnecessary danger and will return safe and well. Once you are satisfied that the matter has been concluded, you return to Haermaga.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_05<tab>ル・マージャの機嫌をなおすことに成功した。話を聞くと、冒険者を夢見る兄ル・フル・ティアを応援していたが、常夏の魔城の挑戦に失敗したにも関わらず笑うル・フル・ティアを見て、本気じゃなかったのかと悲しくなったようだ。ル・フル・ティアは、冒険者と妹ル・マージャに背中を押されて、冒険者になることを改めて決意した。兄妹の様子を「紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_06<tab>Haermaga is visibly moved to hear that R'fhul Tia decided to become an adventurer after he witnessed the guild's acts of heroism at a previous Moonfire Faire. He thanks you for your various contributions and invites you to enjoy the remainder of the festival.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_SEQ_06<tab>ヘールマガに報告した。冒険者から兄妹の様子を聞き、「紅蓮祭」がきっかけとなって新たな冒険者候補が誕生したことを喜んだ。この後も、「紅蓮祭」を盛り上げるためにヘールマガたちに力を貸してあげよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_00<tab>Wait with R'majha.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA9E701 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_01<tab>Speak with R'fhul Tia.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_01<tab>ル・フル・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_02<tab>Find R'majha.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_02<tab>ル・マージャを捜す

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_03<tab>/splash R'majha with water.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_03<tab>ル・マージャに「水をかける」をする

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_04<tab>Return to Haermaga.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_TODO_04<tab>紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガに報告

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_000<tab>The hero has returned! I was watching intently from start to finish. A truly breathtaking display if ever there was one!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_000おう、待ってたぜ！
まったく、見事なもんだ！
クリアおめでとさん！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_001<tab>That was incredible! I've never seen anything like it!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_001すっっっげーーーー！！
すっげえよ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
特に、ゴール手前からのあのジャンプ……俺、感激しました！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_002<tab>I want to try it too!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_002<tab>ねえ、私もあれやってみたい！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_003<tab>Ha ha! Maybe when you're a bit bigger, missy. How about you, R'fhul? It's not too late to change your mind.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_003はっはっは、嬢ちゃんにはさすがにまだ早いな。
で、どうだい、兄貴の方は？
できそうか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_004<tab>I think not. Witnessing <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s spectacular victory has lit a fire in my soul!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_004はい！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんをみていたら、
俺も力がみなぎってきました……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_005<tab>Today, I shall fulfill my destiny! Fame and glory, here I come!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_005よぉーーし！
やるぜーーーー！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>Wait, there's one last thing I─
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>あ、おい！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_007<tab><sigh> I did have a few words of advice for him, but perhaps he won't need it. Hopefully, he will have learned a thing or two from you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Still, I can't help but worry for the lad. Could you keep an eye on him?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_007……ったく、そそっかしいやつだ。
すまないが、様子を見にいってくれないか？
オレはここから動くわけにはいかないもんでな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_008<tab>I'm coming too!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_008<tab>私も行く！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_009<tab>I'll be watching from here, but it might be best to have someone nearby when he─I mean, <var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> he takes a tumble.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_009すまないが、
ル・フル・ティアの様子を見に行ってくれないか？
オレはここから動くわけにはいかないもんでな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_100_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, that truly was a sight to behold! The way you made your way to the top... It was extraordinary!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_100_009さすが、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
俺、感激しました！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_110_009<tab>That was the bestest thing ever!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_110_009すごい、すごーい！
冒険者さん、カッコ良かった！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_010<tab>Haaaaaagh! Here I goooooo!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_010うおおおおおおおおお！！
みててください、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！！
俺の、冒険者への第一歩おおおおお！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_011<tab>Fhul! Oh no! We have to help him!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_011た、たいへん……！
お兄ちゃんのところに行かなきゃ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_012<tab>He looks ready now!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_012お兄ちゃん、いよいよ挑戦するんだね！
特等席でみなくっちゃ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_020<tab><pant> I might have been a little...overzealous.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_020ハァ……ハァ……。
勢い余っちゃいました……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_021<tab>Heh, after all my grand words... What a fool I must look! I still have a long way to go! Hahaha!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_021あ、あはははは……！
やっぱ俺は、ダメだなあ……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんみたいには、いかないや……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_022<tab>...Why?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_022<tab>……うして……？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_023<tab>Why are you laughing!? It's not funny! You're just a...big stupid-face!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_023どうして、失敗したのに笑ってるの……？
一生懸命応援してたのに……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_024<tab>Majha!? <sigh> Whatever's gotten into her?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_024マージャ……！？
あいつ、急にどうしたっていうんだ……？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A1_000_001<tab>Don't just stand there─go after her!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A1_000_001<tab>今は妹を捜すのが先決だ

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A1_000_002<tab>She doesn't seem to like big stupid-faces.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A1_000_002<tab>何か特別な想いがあるようだった

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>R-Right. Er...where did she run off to, now? Please help me look for her!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_030そうですね、何かあったら大変だ……！
すみませんが、一緒に捜してもらえませんか？
西側の海辺へ向かったようです！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_040<tab>Nor do I like being called one. It seems we need to talk. But er...where has she run off to? Please help me look for her!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_040追いかけて話を聞いてやらないと……！
すみませんが、一緒に捜してもらえませんか？
西側の海辺へ向かったようです！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_041<tab>Fhul! Are you all right!?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_041<tab>お兄ちゃん、大丈夫……！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_100_050<tab>Thank the gods she's safe...
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_100_050<tab>やっと見つけた……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_050<tab>Hmph!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_050<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_051<tab>Majha! What's the matter?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_051マージャ？
いったいどうしたっていうんだ……？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_052<tab>Go away, stupid-face!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_052<tab>……お兄ちゃんなんて、知らないもん！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_053<tab>It's no use. She won't talk to me.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_053<tab>まだ、ご機嫌ななめみたいですね。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_054<tab>Well, you leave me no choice. There's only one way to deal with sulky little girls.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_054よーし！
困ったお姫様には、兄ちゃんたちが、いたずらしちゃうぞー？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_055<tab>Hm?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_055<tab>…………！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_056<tab>Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Splash some water on her to make her laugh!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_056)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
マージャに「水をかけ」て、笑わせてやってください！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_057<tab>A few splashes of water and she'll be giggling in no time!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_057<tab>マージャに「水をかけ」て、笑わせてやりましょう！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_058<tab>Hmph!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_058<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_060<tab>Eeek! That's cold! Tee hee hee!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_060きゃはは、つめたーい！
もう、わかったからー！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_061<tab>So, is Miss Sulky going to tell me why she ran off?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_061<tab>さて、やっとお姫様が口をきいてくれるかな？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_062<tab>I'm sorry... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're not cross with me, are you?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_062勝手に飛びだしちゃってごめんなさい。
冒険者さん……怒ってる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_063<tab>It's just that...after the festival, my brother's going on a long journey to become an adventurer.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_063お兄ちゃんはね、「紅蓮祭」が終わったら遠くに行っちゃうの。
冒険者になるために、修行にでるのよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_064<tab>Long journey? What gave you that idea?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_064<tab>マージャ……どうしてそれを……！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_065<tab>I heard you talking about it with Mummy. And I know how much you want to be an adventurer.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_065お兄ちゃんがお母さんと話してるの、聞いちゃったの。
それに、お兄ちゃん見てればわかるもん。
とうとう、ずーーっと憧れてた冒険者になるんだって。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_066<tab>You didn't tell me because you thought I'd be sad. I'm right, aren't I?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_066お兄ちゃんは、
私が寂しがるから、今まで言わずにいたんでしょう？
ちゃんと知ってるんだからね！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_067<tab>I've known all this time. And...it does make me sad. But I wouldn't want you to give up on your dream for me. That's why I told myself not to cry.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_067寂しいよ？
寂しいけど……私は一生懸命なお兄ちゃんが大好き。
だから、泣かないで応援するって決めたの。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_068<tab>I thought you'd be upset when you fell in the water. But you were laughing!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_068それなのに、「常夏の魔城」から落ちちゃったとき、
お兄ちゃんは悔しがるどころか、笑ってた……。
まるで本気じゃなかったみたいに……その姿が悲しくて……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_069<tab>You're right. I should've taken it more seriously, especially since you and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> came to watch me.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_069そっか……兄ちゃんが悪かった。
マージャも一生懸命に応援していてくれたのにな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_070<tab>But I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> serious about becoming an adventurer!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_070<tab>でも、兄ちゃんは本気だ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_071<tab>You see, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we don't have a father, so I help our mother look after Majha. I realized that I needed to become a man, to become strong enough to support my family. I just didn't know how.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_071実は、俺たち兄妹には父親がいないんです。
だから、俺がいつか親父の代わりになって、
母と妹を守れるようにならなきゃって、思ってきました。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_072<tab>But when I went to the Moonfire Faire a few years ago and saw the Cascadiers drive off those dreadful Bombards, I discovered my calling in life─to become an adventurer!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_072そんな時、以前の「紅蓮祭」で、
炎の魔物を退治して活躍する冒険者たちの姿を見たんです。
強い冒険者たちを見て、心底あこがれましたよ……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_073<tab>If I were as brave as the heroes of the Adventurers' Guild, I could protect my family from harm. I could provide for them.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_073自分も冒険者になれば、家族を守れるほどの力が、
身につくんじゃないかって……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_074<tab>As my first step towards becoming an adventurer, the Moonfire Faire presented the perfect opportunity. What better way to prove my worth than by overcoming the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_074だから、どうしても冒険者への最初の一歩として、
この「紅蓮祭」に参加しておきたかった！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_075<tab>But I was so eager to prove myself, I got carried away. And you know the rest. I humiliated myself in front of everyone, so I tried to laugh it off. I didn't know what else to do! I never meant to upset you, Majha.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_075その肝心の一歩目で、あんなふうに思いっきり失敗したから、
さすがに恥ずかしくなってきて、あんな態度を……。
不安にさせちゃって悪かったな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_076<tab>But I haven't given up hope! What do you think, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? If I keep training, do you think that I could make it as an adventurer?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_076)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
俺もちゃんと修行を重ねたら、
いつか、あなたみたいな冒険者になれますか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A2_000_001<tab>“Great oaks from little acorns grow,” as the saying goes.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A2_000_001<tab>きっとなれる！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A2_000_002<tab>There isn't much call for big stupid-faces, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_A2_000_002<tab>無理だと思う……

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>Little acorns? Are you saying I should become a botanist?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_080うおおお、感激だ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんにそう言ってもらえるなんて……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Aha! I think I understand now! Yes, I shall do my utmost to one day become a “great oak”!
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>絶対に、立派な冒険者になってみせます！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_090<tab>Not quite the words of encouragement I was hoping for, but it will take more than that to deter me!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_090うっ……またまた、そんなこと言って！
気を引き締めないと、また失敗するって言いたいんですね？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_091<tab>I mean, all things considered, today could have been a lot worse. At least I didn't crack my skull on a rock like that other poor chap. As long as I keep myself in one piece, I'll be an adventurer sooner or later!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_091その忠告、ありがたく聞いておきます。
絶対に、立派な冒険者になってみせますよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_100<tab>Mahja. You were right about a lot of things. It's true. I am going to be away from home for a while. And my face...yes, it probably is a bit stupid-looking from time to time.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_100マージャ。
兄ちゃんが一人前になって戻ってくるまで、
寂しい想いをさせちゃうけど……

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_101<tab>I didn't mean it! Your face is fine how it is! Well, most of the time, anyway. But if you're going away, will you make me a promise?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_101お兄ちゃん！
いいから、これだけ約束して？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_102<tab>Don't die, no matter what.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_102<tab>成功したいからって、無謀な挑戦だけはやめてね。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_103<tab>You don't have to be a hero. Just be...just be safe. That's all I want!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_103お兄ちゃんが英雄みたいな冒険者になるよりも、
元気でいてくれることの方が、何倍も大切なんだから！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_104<tab>Very well, Majha. I promise I will never die. Erm...well, not any time soon, at least.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_104ああ。
約束するよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_105<tab>Now that's settled, I think it's time for us to go home.
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_105<tab>さて、そろそろ帰ろうか！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_106<tab>Thank you so much! See you again!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RMAJHA_000_106冒険者さん、今日はいろいろとありがとう！
すっごく、カッコ良かったよ！
またねー！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_107<tab>Wait, don't go running─ <sigh> Not again...
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_107<tab>あ、おい、ちょっと待って！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_108<tab>Before I chase after my sister again, I'd like to thank you. You're the kind of adventurer I aspire to be, and it was an honor to meet you.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_108)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
今日は本当に、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_109<tab>If there's one thing I have learned, it is that “Actions speak louder than words.” That's right, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_000_109俺はもう少しマージャにつきあいます。
お世話になった実行委員長さんにも、
よろしく伝えてもらえますか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_100_109<tab>Yes, maybe I should aspire to be the strong, silent type too. Something to work on as I embark on my journey. But before I leave, I would like to spend some time with my family. Please give my regards to Haermaga and the others! Till we meet again!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_RFHULTIA_100_109俺、この紅蓮祭のことは一生忘れません！
さようなら、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_110<tab>Welcome back. I trust all is well?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_110おう、あんたか！
兄妹の様子はどうだった？

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_111<tab>Oh? He decided to become an adventurer after seeing the Moonfire Faire? Well, if that isn't a testament to the festival's power to inspire, I don't know what is!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_111そうか……！
オレたちが開催した「紅蓮祭」がきっかけで、
冒険者になる決意を固めてくれたんだな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_112<tab><sniff> It warms the cockles of my heart, it does...
target: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_112<tab>……胸が熱くなるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_113<tab>And as for you, you've helped make the festival a huge success! After all the casualties we've had, I was worried that the guild would accuse us of constructing a death trap! We've had a few minor maimings, true, but no one's died yet. That has to count for something, aye?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_113あんたは「常夏の魔城」を突破したばかりか、
祭りの目的まで、ひとりで果たしちまったってわけだ。
さすがだぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_114<tab>Of course, this year's Moonfire Faire is far from over, so why not stay and soak up the atmosphere? You can even run the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course again, if you feel so inclined. On behalf of all of the chaperones, you have our heartfelt gratitude!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM403_03137_HAERMAGA_000_114さあて、「紅蓮祭」はまだまだ開催中だ！
オレも、もっともっとこの祭りを盛り上げてみせるさ。
あんたも、よかったらまた挑戦してみてくれよな！
